mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, code AS code, cert_status AS certStatus, request_org_code AS requestOrgCode, request_org_fullname AS requestOrgFullname, request_user_code AS requestUserCode, request_user_fullname AS requestUserFullname, request_time AS requestTime, audit_user_code AS auditUserCode, audit_user_fullname AS auditUserFullname, audit_time AS auditTime, audit_description AS auditDescription, org_name AS orgName, org_external_no AS orgExternalNo, org_external_no1 AS orgExternalNo1, org_external_no2 AS orgExternalNo2, org_external_no3 AS orgExternalNo3, org_type AS orgType, visible_config AS visibleConfig, org_status AS orgStatus, grade_type AS gradeType, en_short_name AS enShortName, org_full_name AS orgFullName, website_url AS websiteUrl, head_picture_resource_code AS headPictureResourceCode, icon_url AS iconUrl, linkman_full_name AS linkmanFullName, linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, telephone AS telephone, telephone2 AS telephone2, fax AS fax, email AS email, customer_telephone AS customerTelephone, province AS province, city AS city, county AS county, address AS address, zip_code AS zipCode, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, credit_code AS creditCode, business_license_resource_code AS businessLicenseResourceCode, business_license_issuance_date AS businessLicenseIssuanceDate, business_license_expiration_date AS businessLicenseExpirationDate, transport_certificate AS transportCertificate, transport_certificate_resource_code AS transportCertificateResourceCode, transport_certificate_expiration_date AS transportCertificateExpirationDate, legal_person_name AS legalPersonName, legal_person_identity_number AS legalPersonIdentityNumber, legal_person_resource_code AS legalPersonResourceCode, sender_code AS senderCode, sender_password AS senderPassword, main_business AS mainBusiness, company_profile AS companyProfile, biz_scope AS bizScope, input_tax_rate AS inputTaxRate, output_tax_rate AS outputTaxRate, tax_number AS taxNumber, tax_type AS taxType, bank_account_code AS bankAccountCode, bank_name AS bankName, bank_account_name AS bankAccountName, bank_account_description AS bankAccountDescription, bank_account_no AS bankAccountNo, settle_config_value1 AS settleConfigValue1, settle_config_unit_code1 AS settleConfigUnitCode1, settle_config_value2 AS settleConfigValue2, settle_config_unit_code2 AS settleConfigUnitCode2, settle_config_value3 AS settleConfigValue3, settle_config_unit_code3 AS settleConfigUnitCode3, settle_config_value4 AS settleConfigValue4, settle_config_unit_code4 AS settleConfigUnitCode4, settle_trading_config_value AS settleTradingConfigValue, settle_trading_config_unit_code AS settleTradingConfigUnitCode, business_agent AS businessAgent, logink_credit_app_key AS loginkCreditAppKey, logink_credit_app_secret AS loginkCreditAppSecret, custom_data AS customData, org_tag AS orgTag, org_biz_type AS orgBizType, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId, upload_status AS uploadStatus FROM member.member_org_info WHERE code = #{code} AND disabled = 0 AND deleted = 0
